titles.title: I see Christ in you and you see Christ in me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see Christ in you and you see Christ in me
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord.(2)
This is life,all other things are death,
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord.(2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will pray for you and you will pray for me ... (2)
God will hear us by His Holy Ghost ... (2)
I will live in you and you will live in me ... (2)
This is life, all other things are death ... (2)
Perfection is my goal, my Jesus told me so...(2)
Sons of God, lift your vision high ... (2)
